snippet.title: Youtubers Life Official Trailer - Now Available on Steam for PC and Mac
snippet.description:
Youtubers Life is already available for PC and Mac on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/428690/. Download it now and become the greatest youtuber ever!

In Youtubers Life, you can turn yourself into the world’s most famous youtuber in history by editing videos, expanding the amount of fans and becoming a wealthy fellow. Create your character and start making your first broadcasts in the cozy room at your parents’ where you have grown up since you were little. Record gameplay sessions, buy new and classic consoles, keep an eye on daily tasks, and socialize yourself to increase your popularity while you have to deal with fans, friends, family and time management!

Youtubers Life is being released in Early Access to offer the Steam community the chance of polishing and improving the game. During this period, the game will just include the option of recording videos based on gaming —it will take more than 10 hours to finish the game!— but 4 extra vertical channels will be added in the near future: music, fitness, cuisine and fashion. Early Access will be cheaper than the full version and those who acquire it now will be the first ones to get the new content.

Download Youtubers Life on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/428690/

More information about Youtubers Life can be found at:

http://www.youtuberslife.com/
https://twitter.com/youtubers_uplay
https://www.facebook.com/youtuberslifegame/
